thread.title: The Tricky Task of Friending (or Unfriending) a Colleague

author: Deborah Cohn
title: The Tricky Task of Friending (or Unfriending) a Colleague
text:
Friending a colleague from the office might seem like a no-brainer.
But before you click that button, think about this: What happens if you later want to unfriend that person?
That question offers a small glimpse into an increasingly problematic—but rarely considered—issue in the workplace. Most professionals believe that expanding their... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
